text2video.title: Text -> Video
text2video.description: Video generation via ComfyUI + VideoHelperSuite nodes.
text2video.notes: Enable ComfyUI Video extension and install video workflows.

text2audio.title: Text -> Audio
text2audio.description: Speech synthesis via the local Speech API.
text2audio.notes: Start the service with the Speech Up action.

text2music.title: Text -> Music
text2music.description: Music prompts via audio tooling (models required).

rag_search.title: RAG Search
rag_search.description: Web search + retrieval foundation for RAG.
rag_search.notes: SearXNG provides search; combine with Qdrant for RAG.

rag_ingest.title: RAG Ingest
rag_ingest.notes: Enable pack to pull ingestion services.

rag_vector_db.title: Vector DB
rag_vector_db.description: Qdrant vector store for embeddings + retrieval.
rag_vector_db.notes: Ensure Qdrant is running before ingest or search.

agent_builders.title: Agent Builders
agent_builders.description: Low-code builders for workflows and agents.
agent_builders.notes: Enable the pack to bring up Langflow/Flowise/Dify.

code_runner.title: Code Runner
code_runner.description: JupyterLab for notebooks and code execution.
code_runner.notes: Jupyter token is set in the container; open the portal to sign in.

ollama_chat.title: Ollama Runtime
ollama_chat.description: Local model runtime for chat and embeddings.
ollama_chat.notes: Ollama must be running on the host.

open_webui_chat.title: Open WebUI
open_webui_chat.notes: Use to chat with local models and RAG.

photo2video.title: Photo -> Video
photo2video.description: Animate images into video via ComfyUI workflows.

defcon_stack.title: DEFCON Stack
defcon_stack.notes: Requires local tool installs; run tests from tool registry.

analysis_suite.title: Analysis Suite
analysis_suite.description: Binary, data, and packet analysis tools.

web_enum.title: Web Enumeration
web_enum.description: HTTP probing, fuzzing, and content discovery.

malware_analysis.title: Malware Analysis
malware_analysis.description: Static and dynamic malware analysis utilities.

red_team_ops.title: Red Team Ops
red_team_ops.description: Operational tooling for red team workflows.

open_webui_internal.title: Open WebUI Internal
open_webui_internal.description: Internal compose check using service name.

tool_impacket.title: Impacket
tool_impacket.description: Network protocol tooling for lateral movement.

tool_sharp_shooter.title: Sharp Shooter
tool_sharp_shooter.description: Red team payload and delivery tooling.

tool_metasploit.title: Metasploit
tool_metasploit.notes: Install separately or add metasploit to _ai_tools.

audio2text.title: Audio -> Text
audio2text.description: Transcribe audio files via the Speech API (Whisper backend).

image2text.title: Image -> Text
image2text.description: Vision-language captioning using Ollama vision models.
image2text.notes: Requires a vision-capable model in Ollama.

text2code.title: Text -> Code
text2code.description: Code generation and refactoring with a coder-tuned model.

rag_chat.title: RAG Chat
rag_chat.description: Chat UI backed by Ollama + Qdrant with web search.
rag_chat.notes: Requires Open WebUI configured with Qdrant + SearXNG.

workflow_automation.title: Workflow Automation
workflow_automation.description: n8n workflows for task automation and integrations.
workflow_automation.notes: Use n8n to orchestrate multi-step automations.

uptime_monitoring.title: Uptime Monitoring
uptime_monitoring.description: Uptime Kuma for service monitoring and alerting.

container_admin.title: Container Admin
container_admin.notes: Manage containers and stacks through Portainer.

object_storage.title: Object Storage
object_storage.description: MinIO S3-compatible storage for artifacts and datasets.
object_storage.notes: Use MinIO for model artifacts and datasets.

reverse_proxy.title: Reverse Proxy
reverse_proxy.description: Traefik edge routing and TLS termination.
reverse_proxy.notes: Use Traefik to route services in prodish deployments.

queue_workers.title: Queue Workers
queue_workers.description: Background job queue and workers (RQ + Redis).
queue_workers.notes: Use ./bin/beast queue worker to run background jobs.
